data.title: Quigley-Sullivan Funeral Home, Inc.
data.meta_description: Throughout our lifetime, these significant events are marked with a ceremony. Mankind has done this since the beginning of time. When a death has occurred, family and friends gather to honor and celebrate a life that has been lived and to share memories.
data.text:
We mark our lives with milestones.

Throughout our lifetime, these significant events are marked with a ceremony. Mankind has done this since the beginning of time. When a death has occurred, family and friends gather to honor and celebrate a life that has been lived and to share memories. As a result of this shared experience, the burden of grief is lightened.

A funeral is the last thing you will ever do for your loved one. It is also the critical first step in the healing process. When you choose Quigley-Sullivan Funeral Home, Inc. you can begin that journey with the peace of mind and satisfaction of knowing that our staff will guide your family in creating a meaningful ceremony to honor the life and memory of your loved one. We have established a reputation for service built on excellence, warmth and personalized caring attention. We appreciate the profound trust you have placed in our family and our service.

Grief Resources

"Only people who are capable of loving strongly can also suffer great sorrow, but this same necessity of loving serves to counteract their grief and heals them." â€” Tolstoy

Grieving is deeply personal. We have many resources to help. Please feel free to contact us anytime if you or someone you love needs support.
